description: Registry of modular tools used to compose TaskWeave configs.

tools.name: ProblemTranslator
tools.description: Translates user queries into structured business problems
tools.prompt_template: Translate this question into a business problem: {input}

tools.name: DataFetcher
tools.description: Fetches data from an API based on the translated problem

tools.name: Analyzer
tools.description: Analyzes the fetched data and identifies patterns
tools.prompt_template: Based on all collected information, analyze patterns and provide insights: {input}
